abilityEffect: Once during your turn, when you play Espeon ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may choose 1 Evolved Pokémon on your opponent's Bench, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokémon, and put it back into his or her hand.

effect.en: Does 60 damage plus 30 more damage for each Trainer card your opponent has in play.
